parameters.query: SELECT key, value FROM config WHERE key = COALESCE($1, '')

INSERT INTO config (key, value, updated_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, NOW())
ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE
SET value = EXCLUDED.value, updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING key, value

SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM activity_log WHERE timestamp >= CURRENT_DATE) as activities_today,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notes WHERE timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('week', CURRENT_DATE)) as notes_this_week,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM raw_events WHERE source_type = 'discord') as total_events,
  (SELECT last_observation_at FROM user_state LIMIT 1) as last_activity

WITH activities_data AS (
  SELECT 
    'activity' as type,
    a.id,
    a.timestamp,
    a.category::text as category,
    a.description as text
  FROM activity_log a
  WHERE $1::text IN ('activities', 'activity', '')
  ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT $2::int
),
notes_data AS (
  SELECT 
    'note' as type,
    n.id,
    n.timestamp,
    n.category::text as category,
    n.text as text
  FROM notes n
  WHERE $1::text IN ('notes', 'note')
  ORDER BY n.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT $2::int
)
SELECT * FROM activities_data
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM notes_data
ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT 
  user_login,
  sleeping,
  last_observation_at,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - last_observation_at))/60 as minutes_since_activity
FROM user_state
LIMIT 1

parameters.jsCode:
// Handle help command
const event = $('When Executed by Another Workflow').first().json.event;

const helpText = `üìö **Available Commands**

**Configuration:**
\`::get <key>\` - Get a config value
\`::set <key> <value>\` - Set a config value

**Information:**
\`::stats\` - Show activity statistics
\`::recent activities [N]\` - Show last N activities (default 10)
\`::recent notes [N]\` - Show last N notes (default 10)
\`::status\` - Show your current state

**Data Management:**
\`::delete activity <short-id> [<id2> ...]\` - Delete activities by short ID
\`::delete note <short-id> [<id2> ...]\` - Delete notes by short ID

**System:**
\`::ping\` - Test if system is working
\`::help\` - Show this message

**Config Keys:**
- \`north_star\` - Your guiding principle
- \`summary_time\` - Daily summary time (format: HH:MM or HH, e.g., "20:00" or "20")

**Examples:**
\`::set north_star Focus on deep work\`
\`::recent activities 20\`
\`::delete activity a1b2c3d4\`
\`::delete activity e5f6g7h8 i9j0k1l2\` (multiple)`;

return {
  response: helpText,
  ...event
};

parameters.query:
-- Delete activity or note by index (1-based position in recent list)
WITH input_array AS (
  SELECT ARRAY[
    NULLIF($2, '')::int,
    NULLIF($3, '')::int,
    NULLIF($4, '')::int,
    NULLIF($5, '')::int,
    NULLIF($6, '')::int,
    NULLIF($7, '')::int,
    NULLIF($8, '')::int,
    NULLIF($9, '')::int,
    NULLIF($10, '')::int
  ] as indices
),
target_indices AS (
  SELECT (unnest(indices) - 1) AS idx
  FROM input_array
),
recent_activities AS (
  SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.timestamp,
    a.description as text,
    'activity' as type,
    (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC) - 1) as idx
  FROM activity_log a
  WHERE $1::text = 'activity'
  ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 100
),
recent_notes AS (
  SELECT 
    n.id,
    n.timestamp,
    n.text as text,
    'note' as type,
    (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY n.timestamp DESC) - 1) as idx
  FROM notes n
  WHERE $1::text = 'note'
  ORDER BY n.timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 100
),
deleted_activities AS (
  DELETE FROM activity_log
  WHERE id IN (
    SELECT ra.id FROM recent_activities ra
    INNER JOIN target_indices ti ON ra.idx = ti.idx
  )
  RETURNING id, timestamp, description as text, 'activity' as type
),
deleted_notes AS (
  DELETE FROM notes
  WHERE id IN (
    SELECT rn.id FROM recent_notes rn
    INNER JOIN target_indices ti ON rn.idx = ti.idx
  )
  RETURNING id, timestamp, COALESCE(title, '') || CASE WHEN title IS NOT NULL THEN ': ' ELSE '' END || text as text, 'note' as type
)
SELECT * FROM deleted_activities
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM deleted_notes;
